title: Vertically middle align image in space remaining above an absolutely positioned div
body:
Before someone marks the question as duplicate - please read and compare carefully with other similar sounding questions - I compared and what they wanted to achieve was something quite different.

I want to achieve something like the image below

Basically a modal, with dynamic height, should be vertically middle aligned with respect to the window. (This, I am able to achieve using position absolute and transform translate).

Now, an image needs to be vertically middle aligned, in the remaining space above the modal and the top of the window.

Is this possible using pure CSS and if so how can be applied?
